name: test_e2e_with_logs[534_EMRG_MONGO_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_008` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $exists operator bypass |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$exists": true}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~61000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:15.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_008-1770842235001-uz1p8x pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_008 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_008-1770842235001-uz1p8x pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_008 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
20:37:15.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_008-1770842235001-uz1p8x pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_008 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
